message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This way, we both get a good portion of the money.

Alice, your offer was a bit too generous towards yourself. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This accounts for the fact that the value decreases faster for me in the next round.
Okay, let's compromise. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  This is still fair, considering the inflation affecting us both, but gives you a better share than the previous round.
